text: @BrookeBCNN @BreneBrown I am sorry you were so sick with COVID19 and glad you are doing better and back to work. As a veterinarian, I wish you had not shared pictures of you sick laying with your dog. We have been encouraging people to socially distance from their pets when sick with COVID19.
